entry.title: Norstar - 14" x 18" OD - Vacuum Bags 4 MIL Clear - 500 / Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Norstar
Type: Disposables
Price: 136.99

Norstar - 14" x 18" OD - Vacuum Bags 4 MIL Clear - 500 / Case

Preserve and extend your food's shelf life with these  chamber vacuum packaging bags!

Great for a variety of applications, vacuum packaging pouches help extend the life of product while also preparing product for sous vide cooking. These particular bags are perfect for use with any chamber vacuum packaging machine, and each bag features an open end for inserting food, whether solid or liquid. Designed for industrial use, the bags are thick and resist punctures and abrasions to reliably preserve product.

Extends Life of Product

These industrial strength bags will help keep your food fresh up to five times longer than traditional storage methods, making it an extremely cost-effective alternative. This is great for planning specialty menus ahead of time or for using just a small amount of product and saving the rest for later.

Great Versatility

Securely sealing any solid or liquid product with a chamber vacuum packaging machine, this bag is designed to be frozen, refrigerated, or microwaved. Plus, it can withstand being boiled for up to minutes, allowing you to use it to cook directly in water. The heat resistance of the bag makes it great for sous vide cooking as well as for storage applications.

entry.title: SmartChoice - 4R Polished Cotton Twine - 1 Roll x 281'
entry.summary:
Vendor: SmartChoice
Type: Disposables
Price: 9.99

SmartChoice - 4R Polished Cotton Butcher Twine - 1 Roll x 281'

Polished cotton primarily used for wrapping and packaging or tying meats and poultry in the food service industry.

This high quality, professional sausage twine is made of a strong poly/cotton fiber, which is the perfect heavy twine for a variety of kitchen tasks. This spool of twine is sold like there is ample twine to create many savory dishes.

Use this twine to tie back and truss chicken and turkey legs when roasting, (which helps the meat to cook evenly and stay in place), tie bundles of herbs, hang meat to dry, tie up roasts, or keep pork, beef, fish and other meats fresh with butcher paper.

3M Scotch - 3/4" x 250" Transparent Tape - 2 / Pack

  • Classic glossy-finish tape
  • Ideal for basic taping jobs around the house
  • A great value!
  • Crystal clear
  • Instant adhesion with excellent holding power

entry.title: Selectum - Desktop Tape Dispenser Heavy Duty - Each
entry.summary:
Vendor: Selectum
Type: Disposables
Price: 4.99

Easily dispense tape with this Desktop Tape Dispenser Heavy Duty!

Ideal for the office, kitchen, or other business area, this masking tape dispenser is designed for easy, efficient dispensing. Not only does is boast a razor sharp cutting blade, but its weighted base helps hold it in place as you retrieve tape. Masking tape (sold separately) is perfect for holding food bags closed or for keeping sandwiches neatly wrapped in food service applications. However it's used, this dispenser is the most convenient way to cut off just the right piece of tape for the job!

Sharp Cutting Blade

This dispenser features a sharp cutting blade to ensure that tape is quickly and evenly cut from its roll. Just pull the tape from the roll and over the blade, yanking down. The blade will cut the tape with ease for efficient dispensing!

entry.title: Profix - Tape Gun Dispenser Heavy Duty - Each
entry.summary:
Vendor: Profix
Type: Disposables
Price: 16.99

Profix - Tape Gun Dispenser Heavy Duty - Each

Seal your packages quickly and efficiently with this Shurtape standard pistol grip dispenser. Its easy to load, durable design offers an anti-reverse bar with blade safety guard for maximum 2" tape width.

This pistol grip dispenser features a convenient tension knob adjustment that allows its user to control the amount of tension to apply onto the tape. A tape smoothing roller eliminates bumps and blemishes upon application to your carton.

entry.title: Hy-Five - Produce Bundling Tape Assorted Colors - Each
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hy-Five
Type: Disposables
Price: 2.49

Hy-Five - PVC Produce Bundling Tape Bag Sealing Tape Assorted Red Blue Green!

A film tape coated with a solvent-based rubber adhesive. This product is available in different colors making it an ideal closure system for identification, security, sealing, date coding, and inventory control applications. PVC produce bundling tape is also highly practical for bag closure of products such as breads, fish, produce and other foods. 

Add this poly bag sealer tape to your stock of everyday supplies. Whether you need to seal, band, bundle, or bag, this tape is sure to get the job done quickly and efficiently. You can even use this red tape to help color code your products while sealing them! This makes it especially useful in grocery stores, commercial kitchens, or bakeries where there is a lot of different products that are opened and need reclosed. Use a poly bag sealer tape dispenser (sold separately) for even easier dispensing in a fast-paced environment.

This tape is made of a moisture resistant material, making it extremely durable in almost any situation as it won't get damp and simply fall off. It even maintains its hold in sub-freezing temperatures! Featuring a high tack, natural rubber adhesive that provides a firm hold, this sealer tape is a lightweight, easy-to-use tape that is great for quickly sealing bags in your commercial setting.

entry.title: Hy-Five - Dispenser For Bundling Tape - Each
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hy-Five
Type: Disposables
Price: 32.99

Hy-Five - Produce Bundling Dispenser For Bundling Tape - Each

entry.title: Cantech - 84100 - Tape Dispenser For 2" Box Sealing Tape - Each
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cantech
Type: Disposables
Price: 13.99

Cantech - 84100 - Tape Dispenser For 2" Box Sealing Tape - Each

Seal your packages quickly and efficiently with this standard pistol grip dispenser. Its easy to load, durable design offers an anti-reverse bar with blade safety guard for maximum 2" tape width.

This grip dispenser features a convenient tension knob adjustment that allows its user to control the amount of tension to apply onto the tape. A tape smoothing roller eliminates bumps and blemishes upon application to your carton.

entry.title: Cantech - 845002- 3" Tape Dispenser Adjustable Tension - Each
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cantech
Type: Disposables
Price: 18.99

Cantech - 845002 Tape Gun Dispenser Heavy Duty - Each Hand Held

Easily seal or ship your important belongings with this handheld box sealing tape dispenser! Use this dispenser with your sealing tape. Its convenient handheld design is a timesaver and creates more efficient, uniform seals.

The adjustable tension brake gives the user control of the unwinding of tape, while the tape guide flips down for efficient loading. To use, simply apply the end of the tape to the box or package, smoothly roll across the surface, tilt, and allow the sharp blades to create an even cut for you. It is designed to dispense packaging tape with a maximum width. This dispenser eliminates the need for extra tools including knives or scissors. Plus, it keeps unraveled tape from sticking to itself and wasting supplies.
